Delhi: Capital city of India with various mining offices.
Jharia, Dhanbad: Major coal mining area in Jharkhand, India.
Bokaro: Known for coal and steel industries.
Jayanti: Coal mining region in West Bengal, India.
Godda: Coal mining area in Jharkhand, India.
Karanpura: Important coal mining area in Jharkhand.
Daltonganj: Region with coal mining activities in Jharkhand.
Raniganj Coalfield: Oldest coalfield in India, located in West Bengal.
Dalingkot (Darjeeling): Mining region in Darjeeling district, West Bengal.
Birbhum: Coal mining and agricultural region in West Bengal.
Chinakuri: Coal mining area in the Raniganj coalfields, West Bengal.
Kamptee (Nagpur): Coal mining region near Nagpur, Maharashtra.
Wardha: Known for coal deposits in Maharashtra.
Ghughus: Important coal mining town in Maharashtra.
Jharsuguda: Coal mining and industrial hub in Odisha.
Talcher: Major coal mining center in Odisha.
Cherrapunji: Coal mining and limestone area in Meghalaya.
Singrauli: Major coal-producing region in Madhya Pradesh.
Sohagpur: Coal mining area in Madhya Pradesh.
Johila: Coal mining field in Madhya Pradesh.
Umaria: Coal mining town in Madhya Pradesh.
Satpura coalfield: Coal mining area in Madhya Pradesh.
Neyveli: Largest lignite coal mine in Tamil Nadu, India.
